document.full_text: at about 1 a.m. local time in syria on friday morning, an activist who has used youtube to document protests in the city of homs uploaded three clips of what he described as a new demonstration there on thursday night.
document.title: the lede: more protest video from syria
lines_and_colors: at about 1 a.m. local time in syria on friday morning, an activist who has used youtube to document protests in the city of homs uploaded three clips of what he described as a new demonstration there on thursday night.
